testcases.Name: Addition: 385 + 516
testcases.Body:
Test Name: Addition: 385 + 516

Preconditions:
- Calculator is launched
- Standard mode is selected
- Memory is cleared

Test Steps:
1. Enter 385
2. Press +
3. Enter 516
4. Press =

Expected Result:
- Display shows 901
